about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Girls and Blocks. A world of sex, lust, and debauchery!

Do you think this is just Tetris or a block game? Oh, you're wrong! It’s a story about a guy who finds himself on an enchanting island where many charming girls await him! By a happy coincidence, he comes across a magical box with a game that helps him gain access to any of the girls. And most importantly, this is just the beginning! The box has a will of its own and contains... well, you’ll find out for yourself if you dare!

With over 15 different locations, each where the main character can meet a unique girl, invite her on a date, use the magical box to release all her hidden desires, and eventually have sex with her. This game is just what you need for a relaxing evening to escape the everyday hustle.

The Story in the Game

Angels, demons, wish fulfillment, beautiful girls, and... a block game. What could they have in common? Uncover all the secrets of Paradise Island and fulfill all your deepest desires.

Game Features

  • Enjoy classic Tetris mechanics that have been loved by millions of players worldwide.

  • Admire cute and charming girls who are ready to strip entirely to solve the puzzle!

  • Interact with the girls, after which you will have the chance to have sex with each one!

  • Use boosters to make level progression easier.

  • Immerse yourself in the vivid graphics and delightful music that enhance the gameplay and make it even more fun.

  • A unique game world with a detailed map of the island, where everyone can find their own paradise.

  • Join Girls and Blocks right now and see how far you can progress in this unique hybrid game of puzzles and entertainment!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content.

Users can meet characters in the game where they are in suggestive poses.

name: Girls and Blocks Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Welcome to the world of Girls and Blocks — an erotic adventure on an enchanting island with lovely ladies. The magical box will unlock surprising secrets. Are you prepared to discover more?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
